name: A Cordial Wedding
description:
Play as Bride on a rampage for her wedding day. Go down the kill menu's list and annihilate all your targets with a variety of weapons before the police arrive!

This game was developed in 2 weeks as a group project for Code Coven's IGM for Unreal Engine 2022.

Ava - UX/UI Design, Menus, Audio
Bri - Weapon blueprints, level design/decoration
Jamie - NPC/AI blueprints and animation, lighting
